snippet: Nine leaders, members and associates of a violent Brooklyn gang face federal charges of racketeering, murder, attempted murder, robbery, assault and illegal use of firearms.
abstract: Nine members of the Six Tre Outlaw Gansta Disciples Folk Nation, a gang that prosecutors say had the effect of an occupying army on the Flatbush section of Brooklyn, are charged with multiple felonies including racketeering, robbery and murder.
lead_paragraph: Nine leaders, members and associates of a violent Brooklyn gang face federal charges of racketeering, murder, attempted murder, robbery, assault and illegal use of firearms.

headline.seo: Members of Violent Brooklyn Gang Face Murder Charges
headline.main: Charges Tell of Iron Grip by a Gang
headline.print_headline: Charges Tell Of Iron Grip By a Gang
